TEXT.TITLE: SELAS CORP OF AMERICA <SLS> SETS SALE/LEASEBACK
TEXT.BODY: Selas Corp of America said it signed a letter of intent for a three mln dlr sale and leaseback of its corporate offices and plants. The sale is subject to a number of conditions, including approval by the board and the unidentified buyer. Reuter
